toxi.geom.mesh

Class SuperEllipsoid

  • java.lang.Object
    • toxi.geom.mesh.SuperEllipsoid
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SurfaceFunction

    public class SuperEllipsoid
extends java.lang.Object
implements SurfaceFunction
    Super ellipsoid surface evaluator based on code by Paul Bourke: http://local.wasp.uwa.edu.au/~pbourke/geometry/superellipse/
